detaileddescription.para: This function will ask the user to enter the flight route ID and will ask user to continue further if they would like to book hotel or car or both as well.

parameterdescription.para: text file with all the details of the booked trip(flight, hotel and car)

detaileddescription.para: This function will ask the user to enter the hotel ID that they want to book hotel acccommodation
The function will create booking details of the user and the fare after applying the discount
and then written to a file.

parameterdescription.para: function takes input as booking ID and price of the flight booked
function returns the booking details of the flight and hotel

detaileddescription.para: This function will ask the user to enter the car ID that they want to book car services.
The function will create booking details of the user and the fare along with any discounts
will be computed and written to a file.

parameterdescription.para: function takes input as booking ID and price of the flight booked
function returns the booking details of the flight and car services.

detaileddescription.para: This function will ask the user to enter the car ID and hotel ID based
on the flight routes that are already booked.
The function will create booking details of the user and the fare along with any discounts
will be computed and written to a file for all the three packages that the user would like to book.

parameterdescription.para: function takes input as booking ID and price of the flights
function returns the booking details of the flight, hotel and car services.

briefdescription.para: This implements booking of all three packages - flight, hotel and car services for the Travel Management System.
